titleStmt.title: śaraṇāgatidīpikā sudarśanaśatakam ṣoḍaśāyudastutiḥ śudarśanāṣṭakam nakṣatranighaṇṭu hayagrīvasahasranāma śrīraṅgarājastavam and one unknown text.

repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: This is a multitext manuscript. It has 8 text. One text is unkown. Right margins are broken. Thin palm leaf used as cover. The last folio has spots and the writing is faded, making it difficult to read in places. On the front cover number 59 is written in the left margin in pink chalk. sudarśanaśata?rma śaraṇāgatidīdīpikai ṣoḍaśasuya?stuti sudarśanāṣṭakam aṣṭapadī 24 śrīguṇaratnakośaṃ śrīraṃgarajantivaṭavṛśo?ttaraśatakam ṅakṣatra nirvana śrīhayagrīvasahasranāmaṃ . The actual arrangement of the texts in the manuscript deviates from this order. At the end of the text 5 Nakṣatranighaṇṭu s a few lines are scribbled in granth, of which some words are unclear. The other part of the folio has hasty hand writing but seems that it is related to astrology. The numeration is continues. The text found after the Nakṣatranighaṇṭu is as : textx-11v-1 ādyāśnirukṣu? ghṛhyate vedān ravidurśajakṛt vasuṣo textx-11v-2 ḍaśeṣu …. one table 4 columns and 4 lines 1 athakubha. undapa 2 oḍava. .. 3 ?ḍana. … 4 kuḥtsa textx-12r 1 piṇḍākṣaramantrāṇām siddhādīnaiva textx-12r 2 śodhayet .. Folio 12v is half balnk.

msItem.title: Śaraṇāgatidīpikā
msItem.author: Vedāntadeśika
msItem.rubric: text1-1v1 śrīmānveṃkaṭā(broken 1 letter) ryaḥ kavitārkikakesarī vedāntacāryyavaryo me sannidattāṃ sadā hṛdi .. śrīmate hayagrīvāya namaḥ . śrīmate vedāntagurave namaḥ śrīmattriśailāgryamahādeśi 1v2 kāyanamaḥ
msItem.incipit: text1-1v2 padmāpate svastipadena vivicyamānaṃ paśyantviha prapadana pravaṇā mahāntaḥ
msItem.explicit: text1-5r 6 tattvaṃ pratyāsīdadvimuktānubhavapala?mut bhedalabdhavat kṛtārthaṃ prāpte bijasya bhede pariṇḍamati parabrahma sat satbrahmacāri 60
msItem.finalRubric:
text1-5r 6 iti
text1-5r 7 kavitārkikasiṃhasya sarvatantrasvatantrasya śrīmatveṃkaṭanāthasyavedāntācāryyasya kṛtiṣu śaraṇāgatidīpikā saṃpūrṇā .. śrīyai namaḥ ..

msItem.title: Sudarśanaśatakam
msItem.incipit:
[text2-1v ]1 trayaścakremunipuṃgavaḥ tamahaṃviduṣāṃ varyyasukṛto rāyaṇ? bhaje raṃgeśavijñaptikarāmayasya cakāra śa
[text2-1v] 2 keśa nutiṃ nivṛtyai samāśraye haṃ varapūraṇīṃ yaḥ taṃ kūranārāyaṇanāmakaṃ muniṃ saudarśanyujjihānā diśi vidiśi tiraskṛtya sāvitramarci
msItem.explicit: [text2-9v] 7 kuranārāñaṇena stotraṃ nirviṣṭabhogo bhajati sa paramāṃ cakrasāyujyalakṣmīṃ 100 …
msItem.finalRubric: [text2-9v] 7 hariḥ oṃ ….. śrīmate nigamānta mahādeśikāya namaḥ

msItem.title: ṣoḍaśāyudastutiḥ
msItem.incipit: [text3 9v-]8 svasaṃkalpakalākalpairāyudhairāyudheśvaraḥ juṣṭaḥ ṣoḍaśībhirdīvyaiḥ juṣatāṃ vaḥ paraḥ pumān . 1 . yadā yattaṃ jagaccakraṃ kālaccakrañca śāśvataṃ pātu
msItem.explicit: [text3 10r-]9 so vyāt saudarśano viśvamāyudhairṣoḍaśāyudhaḥ . 18 .. śrīmatveṅkaṭanāthena śreyase bhūyase satāṃ kṛteyamāyudhendrasya ṣoḍaśāyudhasaṃstutiḥ 19
msItem.finalRubric: [text3 10r-]10 iti śrīkavitā.. ṣoḍaśayudastutiḥ saṃpūrṇā .. śrīmate vedāntagurave namaḥ

msItem.title: śudarśanāṣṭakam
msItem.incipit: text4-10v-1 bahirrantasthamacche?di jyotirvande sudarśanaṃ vetāvyī hatāsaṃkalpaṃ vastu lakṣmīdharaṃ viduḥ .. pratibhaṭaśreṇī bhīṣaṇa varaguṇastomabhūṣaṇajagadavasthā
msItem.explicit: text4-10v- 9 daṃ prabhūtasāraṃ paṭhatāṃ veṃkaṭanāyakapraṇītaṃ viṣame pi manorathaḥ pradhāvanna vihaneta rathāṅgadhūryaguptaḥ ..
msItem.finalRubric: text4-10v- 9 iti śrīkavītā.. ṣu .. sudarśanāṣṭakaṃ saṃpūrṇaṃ .. .. .

msItem.title: nakṣatranighaṇṭu
msItem.incipit: text5-11r-1 athātra tārakādīnāṃ nighaṇṭurśīkṣyate mayā .. bha? śvininakṣatraṃ āvitalaṃ…
msItem.explicit: text5-11r-10 ca va āvirbhūyatu nigamataḥ . pādyaṃ pauṣṇamityāhuḥ antyaṃ puṣā ca revatī …

msItem.title: hayagrīvasahasranāma
msItem.incipit: text6-1r-1 oṃ tāta me śrīhayagrīvanāmnāṃ sāhasramuttamam . adhyetuṃ jāyate kāṅkṣā tatprasīda mayi prabho
msItem.explicit: text-6-8r-8 ssaṃpat sārsvatādhīkaḥ . iti hayavadanānanAravindānmadhulaharīva nirgalā galanti . jagati daśaśati tadīyanāmānāṃ jayati jaḍānapi gīrṣu javayanti . śrīmate hayagrīvāyanamaḥ .
msItem.finalRubric: text6-8r-9 śrīmatśrīśailāyyamahādeśīkāya namaḥ . śrīmate nimāntagurave namaḥ . śrīyai namaḥ . iti parāśarasaṃhitāyāṃ hayagrīvakalponāmaaṣṭāviṃśodhyāyaḥ .

msItem.title: śrīraṅgarājastavam
msItem.rubric: text7-8v-1 śrīmate hayagrīvāya namaḥ . śrīmanśrīśailāyyamahādeśikāya namaḥ . śrīraṃganāyakyai namaḥ .
msItem.incipit: text7-8v1 śrīmānveṅkaṭanāthāyya kavītārkīkakesarī vedāntācāryyavarryo me sannidattāṃ text7-8v-2 sadā hṛdi . śrīparāśarabhaṭṭāryyaḥ śrīraṃgeśapurohitaḥ . śrīvatsāṃkasutaśrīmān śreyase mestu bhuyase .. śrīyai samastavida
msItem.explicit: text7-17v -10 104.. tvanṃīnapānīyyanayenadharmadhībhaktivairā(gyī)gyajuṣau bibharṣi . raṅgeśa mā pāṃsi mitapaṃcaṃ yat pāniyyaśālamarubhuṣu tat syāt .. 105

msItem.title: Unknown text
msItem.incipit: text8-1v-1 śrīmanśrīśailāyyamahādeśikāya namaḥ . śrīraṃganāyakyai namaḥ . sakalakavijanāṃ bhāsasu lokāvalaṃbā

support.p: Thin palm leaf used as cover.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numerals in the left margin of the verso. New numeration for the individual text. Folio are not numbered for the text2.
supportDesc.condition: Good. Some folio with faint ink so diffuclt to read.

handNote.desc: Good hand writing but due to faint ink and sometimes due to brown patches on the folio text is not readable.

additions.desc: hariḥ oṃ is the written in the left margin on text1-1v, and text2-1v.
On text6-1r in the left margin is written hayagrīvasahasranāma.
jvālāvarṇanaṃ hariḥ oṃ is written in the left margin on text2-[1v].

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to separate words. Question mark is used to show illegible syllable.

TEI.text:
text1-1v1 śrīmānveṃkaṭā(broken 1 letter) ryaḥ kavitārkikakesarī vedāntacāryyavaryo me sannidattāṃ sadā hṛdi .. śrīmate hayagrīvāya namaḥ . śrīmate vedāntagurave namaḥ śrīmattriśailāgryamahādeśi
text1-1v2 kāyanamaḥ padmāpate svastipadena vivicyamānaṃ paśyantviha prapadana pravaṇā mahāntaḥ
text1-5r 6 tattvaṃ pratyāsīdadvimuktānubhavapala?mut bhedalabdhavat kṛtārthaṃ prāpte bijasya bhede pariṇḍamati parabrahma sat satbrahmacāri 60 iti
text1-5r 7 kavitārkikasiṃhasya sarvatantrasvatantrasya śrīmatveṃkaṭanāthasyavedāntācāryyasya kṛtiṣu śaraṇāgatidīpikā saṃpūrṇā .. śrīyai namaḥ ..

[text2-1v ]1 śrīmate hayagrīvāyanamaḥ śrīmatsaudarśana maḥ? trayaścakremunipuṃgavaḥ tamahaṃviduṣāṃ varyyasukṛto rāyaṇ? bhaje raṃgeśavijñaptikarāmayasya cakāra śa
[text2-1v] 2 keśa nutiṃ nivṛtyai samāśraye haṃ varapūraṇīṃ yaḥ taṃ kūranārāyaṇanāmakaṃ muniṃ saudarśanyujjihānā diśi vidiśi tiraskṛtya sāvitramarci [text2-9v] 7 kuranārāñaṇena stotraṃ nirviṣṭabhogo bhajati sa paramāṃ cakrasāyujyalakṣmīṃ 100 … hariḥ oṃ ….. śrīmate nigamānta mahādeśikāya namaḥ

[text3 9v-]8 śrīmān hṛdi .. svasaṃkalpakalākalpairāyudhairāyudheśvaraḥ juṣṭaḥ ṣoḍaśībhirdīvyaiḥ juṣatāṃ vaḥ paraḥ pumān . 1 . yadā yattaṃ jagaccakraṃ kālaccakrañca śāśvataṃ pātu [text3 9v-]9 vastat parañcakraṃ cakrarūpasya cakriṇaḥ .. 2 yat prasūti śatai rāśan rudrāḥ paraśulāñcanā ssa dīvyo hetirājasya paraśuḥ paripātu naḥ .. 3..
[text3 10r-]9 so vyāt saudarśano viśvamāyudhairṣoḍaśāyudhaḥ . 18 .. śrīmatveṅkaṭanāthena śreyase bhūyase satāṃ kṛteyamāyudhendrasya ṣoḍaśāyudhasaṃstutiḥ 19
[text3 10r-]10 iti śrīkavitā.. ṣoḍaśayudastutiḥ saṃpūrṇā .. śrīmate vedāntagu rave namaḥ

text4-10v-1 śrīmān ….. hṛdi .. bahirrantasthamacche?di jyotirvande sudarśanaṃ vetāvyī hatāsaṃkalpaṃ vastu lakṣmīdharaṃ viduḥ .. pratibhaṭaśreṇī bhīṣaṇa varaguṇastomabhūṣaṇajagadavasthā text4-10v-2 nakāraṇa janibhayasthānatāraṇa nikhiladuṣkarmakarśana nigamasaddharmadarśana. . jaya jaya śrī sudarśana jaya jaya śrī sudarśana .. 1.. text4-10- 8. tantratantrita jaya.. 7 .. bhuvana netastrimaya savana tejastrayīmaya . niravadi svādu cinmaya nikhila śakterjaganmaya āmita viśvakiyāmāya śamitaviśvak bhayāmaya jaya.. 8.. dvicatuṣkami text4-10- 9. daṃ prabhūtasāraṃ paṭhatāṃ veṃkaṭanāyakapraṇītaṃ viṣame pi manorathaḥ pradhāvanna vihaneta rathāṅgadhūryaguptaḥ .. iti śrīkavītā.. ṣu .. sudarśanāṣṭakaṃ saṃpūrṇaṃ .. .. .

text5-11r-1 athātra tārakādīnāṃ nighaṇṭurśīkṣyate mayā .. bha? śvininakṣatraṃ āvitalaṃ…
text5-11r-10 ca va āvirbhūyatu nigamataḥ . pādyaṃ pauṣṇamityāhuḥ antyaṃ puṣā ca revatī … iti nakṣatranighaṇṭu .

text6-1r-1 śrīmate hayagrīvāya namaḥ . oṃ tāta me śrīhayagrīvanāmnāṃ sāhasramuttamam . adhyetuṃ jāyate kāṅkṣā tatprasīda mayi prabho
text-6-8r-8 ssaṃpat sārsvatādhīkaḥ . iti hayavadanānanAravindānmadhulaharīva nirgalā galanti . jagati daśaśati tadīyanāmānāṃ jayati jaḍānapi gīrṣu javayanti . śrīmate hayagrīvāyanamaḥ .
text6-8r-9 śrīmatśrīśailāyyamahādeśīkāya namaḥ . śrīmate nimāntagurave namaḥ . śrīyai namaḥ . iti parāśarasaṃhitāyāṃ hayagrīvakalponāmaaṣṭāviṃśodhyāyaḥ .

text7-8v-1 śrīmate hayagrīvāya namaḥ . śrīmanśrīśailāyyamahādeśikāya namaḥ . śrīraṃganāyakyai namaḥ . śrīmānveṅkaṭanāthāyya kavītārkīkakesarī vedāntācāryyavarryo me sannidattāṃ
text7-8v-2 sadā hṛdi . śrīparāśarabhaṭṭāryyaḥ śrīraṃgeśapurohitaḥ . śrīvatsāṃkasutaśrīmān śreyase mestu bhuyase .. śrīyai samastavida text7-17v -10 104.. tvanṃīnapānīyyanayenadharmadhībhaktivairā(gyī)gyajuṣau bibharṣi . raṅgeśa mā pāṃsi mitapaṃcaṃ yat pāniyyaśālamarubhuṣu tat syāt .. 105 iti raṅgastavaṃ samāptam .. text7- 18r 1 SrIparASaraBawwAryyaSrIraMgeSapurohitaH SrIvastANkasutaSrImAnSreyase me stu Buyase .. SrImaSrISEluAyyamahAdeSikAya namaH . SrImatSrIraNgarAjamahAgurave namaH SrImate nigamAntamahAdeSikA 2 ya namaH. SrIyE namaH . SrIraNganATaparabrahmaRe namaH . SrIraNganAyako namaH SrIsudarSanakftAjYAya namaH SrImate hayagrIvAya namaH (something written in granth Bawwa?Yca vawu?sa?Ra) …. text7- 18r-1 śrīparāśarabhaṭṭāryyaśrīraṃgeśapurohitaḥ śrīvastāṅkasutaśrīmānśreyase me stu bhuyase .. śrīmaśrīśailuāyyamahādeśikāya namaḥ . śrīmatśrīraṅgarājamahāgurave namaḥ śrīmate nigamāntamahādeśikā text7- 18r-2 ya namaḥ. śrīyai namaḥ . śrīraṅganāthaparabrahmaṇe namaḥ . śrīraṅganāyako namaḥ śrīsudarśanakṛtājñāya namaḥ śrīmate hayagrīvāya namaḥ (something written in Granth bhaṭṭa?ñca vaṭu?sa?ṇa) ….

text8-1v-1 śrīmate hayagrīvāya namaḥ . śrīmanśrīśailāyyamahādeśikāya namaḥ . śrīraṃganāyakyai namaḥ . sakalakavijanāṃ bhāsasu lokāvalaṃbā text8 18r Right marginal line 4 dharaṇīkalpavṛkṣasya tasyatāriṇyamadhvarī ākarṣyatyāyatākīrṇā?
text8-18r-6 nāgakurmakukaradevadattadhanajñayāḥ pañcaprāṇāḥ śuca
